task.summary:
merging cloud and mountain shadow branch to master
# Conflicts: # s2tbx-muscate-reader/pom.xml # s2tbx-muscate-reader/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/dataio/muscate/MuscateProductReader.java # s2tbx-s2msi-idepix/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/s2msi/idepix/algorithms/sentinel2/S2IdepixClassificationOp.java # s2tbx-s2msi-idepix/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/s2msi/idepix/algorithms/sentinel2/S2IdepixPostProcessOp.java # s2tbx-s2msi-idepix/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/s2msi/idepix/operators/cloudshadow/S2IdepixCloudShadowOp.java # s2tbx-s2msi-idepix/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/s2msi/idepix/util/S2IdepixConstants.java # s2tbx-s2msi-idepix/src/main/java/org/esa/s2tbx/s2msi/idepix/util/S2IdepixUtils.java
added check for missing lat and lon tiepoints in input L1b HDF files
added optional MOD03 land mask product as input in Idepix MODIS
